content: the most oft-requested and popular everyone remembers these pattern in the dbkn collection even though there are numerous iterations of this style that has been around forever i was asked countless times for written instructions so finally wrote up the version i remember my grandmother making for us when we were kids ***clarification *** the total slipper length should end up being 1/2 less than total foot length in other words whatever combination of garter st portion & ribbed toe portion should come out to 1/2 less than total foot length for example for a 7 foot the garter st portion could be worked to 4 5 and then the ribbed toe portion for 2 which would equal 6 5 before finishing off the toe in my case i have a 9 foot so would work 6 of garter st and 2 5 of ribbing for a total length of 8 5 before finishing off the toe
